name: parquet-format
description: ParquetFormat is a columnar storage format that supports nested data.

dependencies.name: java
dependencies.description:
The Java Development Kit (JDK) released by Oracle Corporation in the
form of a binary product aimed at Java developers. Includes a complete
JRE plus tools for developing, debugging, and monitoring Java
applications.

dependencies.name: maven
dependencies.description: Apache Maven is a software project management and comprehension tool.

dependencies.name: thrift
dependencies.description:
Software framework for scalable cross-language services development.
Thrift combines a software stack with a code generation engine to build
services that work efficiently and seamlessly between C++, Java, Python,
PHP, Ruby, Erlang, Perl, Haskell, C#, Cocoa, JavaScript, Node.js,
Smalltalk, OCaml and Delphi and other languages.
